description: We're Not Really Here: Nedum Onuoha on Man City and creativity
title: We're Not Really Here: Nedum Onuoha on Man City and creativity
title_page: We're Not Really Here: Nedum Onuoha on Man City and creativity - BBC Sport
maintext:
In the latest episode of We're Not Really Here, former Manchester City defender Nedum Onuoha discusses two current stars, Kevin De Bruyne and Phil Foden.
He was joined in the studio by Lewis Brown of City Xtra to discuss how the midfielders influence the team and whether Pep Guardiola's side are short of creativity when De Bruyne is unavailable.
